LanguageData.lblMinGCMemoryDescription: Set MINIMUM amount of memory to be used before GC is called.
LanguageData.lblForcePauseDescription: Enable to force the game to pause when the menu is opened
LanguageData.lblSetTickIntervalDescription: Sets amount of ticks that need to pass before updating memory usage (this interval is also used for how often the GC Scheduler is ran). At 1x speed 60 ticks is 1 second.
LanguageData.GCDisabled: Garbage Cleaner has been Disabled! Be careful with memory usage!
LanguageData.ShowMainTab: Show the GC Scheduler tab in-game?
LanguageData.lblStatsNote: NOTE: "Current" Stats are only updated while in-game!
